snippet.title: RPG Glorious Savior - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
An everlasting story about the Hero's Sword with animated 3D battles!
RPG Glorious Savior is now available for Android/iPhone!

App Store
[Premium]
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1089374508?mt=8
[Freemium]
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1089373880?mt=8

Google Play
[Premium]
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kemco.execreate.glorioussaviorpremium&hl=en
[Freemium]
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kemco.execreate.glorioussavior&hl=en

The Hero's Sword, which was used 300 years ago to defeat the Overlord, has been stolen, and demons are becoming more and more common. Rain, a member of the aristocracy, is ordered directly by the King to get the sword back, and sets off on a quest with his attendant, Viola, to find the sword. They don't know, though, that their quest will become a journey through time, to places far off in the past. 
The binding strings of fate, and the desire to trust someone... Where will these tangled threads lead them? This is the beginning of an epic story, a story that spans everlasting time! Find out as this epic story unfolds!

©2015 KEMCO/EXE-CREATE
※All graphics terms, characters and elements are subject to change in the actual product.
